transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Yes sir. Good morning sir.
Executive: Good morning.
Executive: Sir, is Sparsh speaking from IndiaMART team?
Customer: Ha ji mam bataiye.
Executive: Ji ji. Sir, aapko kuch issue aa raha tha leads ko leke?
Customer: Ha mere paas lead lead aa nahi raha mere paas matlab.
Executive: Achcha, to kis tarike ki matlab kya issue hai matlab like lead kis tarike ki chahiye location issue hai ya fir kya hai sir?
Customer: Are mere paas mere kaam se related lead hi nahi aa raha.
Executive: Achcha matlab location vagaira ka to nahi hai na sir. Jaise aap deep well d watering service hai hai na?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To location aapki area ki rahi Gwalior
Customer: Ya all over India sir?
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Ji sir all over India rahegi ya Gwalior?
Customer: Location to Gwalior rahega na.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir matlab lead aapko sirf Gwalior ki hi chahiye hai ya fir all over India ki kahin ki bhi hogi chalegi. Kya sir?
Customer: All over India.
Executive: All over India na. Okay okay okay. To sir yahan pe kuch kuch leads available hain. Abhi agar aap free hain to ek bar aap video call pe aa sakte hain to main aapko ek bar check karwa deti hoon.
Customer: Ji abhi to mam abhi to nahi aa sakta mam. Kis time free hain aap? Time by phone main aapko lagata hoon jaise 2:30 laga raha hoon.
Executive: Main 3:00 baje tak call kar lu aapko ek bar?
Customer: Theek theek theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai main aapko 3:00 baje call karungi to hum video call pe connect ho sakte hain na sir?
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: Theek hai sir. Okay thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving leads related to his work.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to check leads via video call.

- Agreed to connect on a video call at 3:00 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer at 3:00 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, location, video call
